ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] To cure or not to cure...?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sure they weren t LD? ... Från: Su [mailto:suceress@killall.net] Skickat: Wednesday, January 16, 2002 5:59 AM Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Ämne: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
Sure they weren't LD?

-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Skickat: Wednesday, January 16, 2002 5:59 AM
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: Re: [EverQuest] To cure or not to cure...?



Very weird. Was there anything different about the gnomes? Did they have red
text for their names?
if not, then bug report it.
luv,
-Su

> Hello,
> I play a level 16 barbarian shaman, and lately ive been trying to
> fight and level in Oasis of Marr. Usually im in a group, and as
> happens when fighiting in Oasis, usually one or more of my party
> members gets rabies or is poisoned by whatever mob we are fighting at
> the time. Since as a shaman i have Cure Disease (which cures rabies)
> and Cure Poison, i keep them memmed so that if a party member is
> poisoned or becomes rabid, i can cure them (most of the time, it
> works on the first cast, the second one if nothing else). The other
> day, i was grouped with two gnomes, one a warrior and the other... i
> cant remember, but he was a gnome too, and another barbarian. We
> were fighting a madman or zombie or something like that, and everyone
> but me got rabies. I healed the barbarian of it no sweat, but i used
> up my entire mana bar trying to heal the gnomes! For some reason, it
> wouldnt work, no matter how many times i cast it! So i went to the
> dock and there were some other random people that were rabid too, and
> i healed them without a problem, but i still couldnt heal the
> gnomes!! Should i report this as a bug or is this just something that
> is the norm? Help on this matter would be appreciated!!
>
> Thank you sooooo much,
> Lorecie <Vivix Protectorate>
> 16th shaman
> Errolisi Marr
>
>
